state.code:
C4Component
    title Component diag for app

   
    ContainerDb(storage, "Storage", "Device local Storage")

    Container_Boundary(app, "app") {
        Component(ui, "ui", "Python CLI component", "An interactive cli component")
        Component(router,"router","Python component", "Routes user petitions")

        Boundary(core,"core"){
            Component(list,"list","Python component", "Manages lists")
        }

    }

    Rel(list,storage,"acees lists")
    Rel(router,list,"ask a petition for a list")
    Rel(list,router,"responds to the petition")
    Rel(router,ui,"inform on how petition went like")
